metadata.source: P.L. Vaidya in: Mahayana-sutra-samgrahah, Part 1. Darbhanga: The Mithila Institute 1961 (Buddhist Sanskrit Texts, 17)

children.text: 1 atha khalu bhagavāṃstāsāṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ saṃpraharṣaṇārthaṃ punarapīmāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ paridīpayamānastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
kiṃ kāraṇaṃ ya jina bhāṣati dharmanetrīṃ
evaṃ śruṇitva na ca muhyati nāsti trāso
na ca rupa vedana na saṃjña na cetanā ca
vijñāna sthānu aṇumātra na bhonti tasya
na ca nirvṛtiṃ spṛśati so viharāti prajñām
kasmātkuto va imi śūnyaka sarva dharmāḥ
vyuparīkṣamāṇu na ca līyati nāsti trāso
saci rupa saṃjña api vedana cetanā ca
na ca rupa vedana na saṃjña na cetanāyā
na ca manyate ahu samādhitu vyutthito vā
no cāpi so labhati yatra carāti dharmam
yo 'sau na vidyati sa eṣa avidyamāno
tāṃ bālu kalpayi avidya karoti vidyām
vidyā avidya ubhi eti asanta dharmā
māyopamāṃ ya iha jānati pañca skandhāṃ
na ca māya anya na ca skandha karoti anyān
trāso na bheṣyati śruṇitva jināna mātrām
yatha te ca māya tatha jānati sarvasattvāṃ
nirmāṇu sarva jagato na ca tasya trāso
rupaṃ ca saṃjña api vedana cetanā ca
vijñāna bandhu na ca mukta asaṅgabhūto
evaṃ ca bodhi kramate na ca līnacitto
na ca labhyate ya vrajate diśa āruhitvā
yatha agni nirvṛtu na tasya gatipracāro
yasmiṃś ca kāli samaye vidu bodhisattvo
mahatīṃ janeti karuṇāṃ na ca sattvasaṃjñā
amṛtaṃ ti jñānu paramaṃ na tu yo pareṇa
evaṃ carantu na ca kāṅkṣati bodhisattvo
jñātavya yo vihara te sa upāyaprajño
rupasmi yo na sthihate na ca vedanāyāṃ
saṃjñāya yo na sthihate na ca cetanāyām
vijñāni yo na sthihate sthitu dharmatāyāṃ
evaṃ ca sthānu athito sthita bodhisattvo
asthānu sthānu ayu sthānu jinena ukto
yo dharma bhāṣyati ya bhāṣyati bhāṣyamāṇāṃ
catvāri pudgala ime na trasanti ye 'smin
śikṣāaśikṣa na ya śikṣati eṣa śikṣā
niryāyatī ya iya śikṣa guṇe ratānām
rupe na prajña iti rupi na asti prajñā
vijñāna saṃjña api vedana cetanā ca
na ca eti prajña iti teṣa na asti prajñā
sattvāna yā ca prakṛtī sa anantapārā
te pāraprāpta sthita pāramite hu bhonti
ya imāṃ grahīṣyati paryāpuṇatī sa nityaṃ
viṣa vahni śastra udakaṃ na kramāti tasyo
otāru māru na ca vindati mārapakṣo
kala puṇya bhonti na sa stūpi karitva pūjām
ye saukhya saṃskṛta asaṃskṛta ye ca saukhyā
sarve ca saukhya prasutā itu veditavyāḥ
yenaiva rāja vrajate sa ha cakravartī
kiṃ kāraṇaṃ na mi śarīri agauravatvaṃ
yatha rājaniśrita naro labhi sarvi pūjāṃ
śīle ca kṣānti tatha vīrya tathaiva dhyāne
ekā ca sā api nidarśayi sarvadharmān
saci rūpa saṃjña api vedana cetanāyāṃ
na hi dharma paṇḍita vināśa karoti jātu
yasmin na rūpa api vedana cāpi saṃjñā
anupādu śūnya na ya jānati sarvadharmān
kiṃ kāraṇaṃ ta iha śikṣita vādiśreṣṭhā
yāṃ śrutva śrāvaka spṛśanti vimukti śīghraṃ
na ca sāgarāṇa ratanā bhavi naikarūpāḥ
jñānasya co asati nāsti guṇāna vṛddhiḥ
na ca bodhi sāgarasamā na ca buddhadharmāḥ
na kalā pi jyotikagaṇe siya sarvaābhāḥ
ekasmi tatra ciya teṣa jināna puṇyaṃ
saha yukta pāramita ye 'pi ca buddhadharmāḥ
na ca dharma dharmi pariṇāmayate kadācit
saci so nimitta kurute na ca mānayāti
yatha te jinā kuśala eva prajānayanti
na ca so hi buddha kṣipate jina uktavādī
vina prajña pañca imi pāramitā acakṣuḥ
na ca tāva puṇyu labhate akaritva cakṣuḥ
ākāśa yatra na pratiṣṭhitu kiṃci tatra
saci manyate ahu carāmi jināna prajñāṃ
paricārikā ya na ca kāṅkṣati paṇḍitehi
saha śrutva tasya puna bheṣyati śāstṛsaṃjñā
so vā laghū anubudhiṣyati bodhi śāntām
śrutvā ca so imu kṣipiṣyati so 'lpabuddhiḥ
tasmā hu śraddadhata eva jināna mātāṃ
na ca paśyakaṃ labhati nāpi ca sarvadharmān
aṇumātra yo na khalu yujyati skandhadhātau
na ca kāṅkṣate ayu prayujyati śikṣamāṇaḥ
āśvāsaprāpta bhavatī na ca tasya trāso
śṛṇu tāta yo labhati bodhi gaveṣamāṇaḥ
āśvāsaprāpta bhavatī na ca tasya trāso
athavā na paśyati nimitta nikāṅkṣa bhoti
yatha istri gurviṇi ya ceṣṭati vedanābhi
rati chanda vīkṣati spṛśiṣyati bodhi śīghram
na ca rūpavṛddhi na ca paśyati pārihāṇim
na ca nirvṛtiṃ spṛśati so viharāti prajñām
caramāṇu yo na iha kalpayi buddhadharmāṃ
bala ṛddhipāda na ca kalpayi bodhi śāntām
na ca jāti bhūmi parikīrtitu nāpi gotraṃ
na ca so śruṇiṣyati kṣipiṣyati mārakarma
ye cāpi tasmi samaye imu dharma śreṣṭhaṃ
imi mārakarma bhaviṣyanti ya tasmi kāle
anye ca neka vividhā bahu antarāyā
ye te bhavanti ratanā ya anarghaprāptā
mātrāya putra bahu santi gilāni kāye
tasmā hu buddha kṛta nāma tathāgatebhiḥ
na pi sattvasaṃjña api teṣu kadāci bhoti
na hi darśanaṃ bhaṇitu śakya nidarśanena
yo eva paśyati sa paśyati sarvadharmān
na ca rāja grāma vrajate na ca rājyarāṣṭrān
sarvaṃ ca ādadati so viṣayātu āyam
na ca bodhisattva calate kvaci dharmatāyāṃ
ghaṭake apakvi yatha vāri vaheya kācit
na ca bhedanādbhayamupaiti ca svasti geham
kiṃcāpi utthitu svayaṃ na prabhoti gantum
na ca bhajyate spṛśati bodhi nararṣabhāṇām
dānaṃ ca śīlamapi kṣānti tathaiva vīryaṃ
trāṇā bhavanti jagatī śaraṇā ca lenā
na ca skandhadhātu na ca āyatanaiḥ sanaddhāḥ
na ca kenacīdadhigato na ca prāpuṇanti
atikrānta yā tathata yā tathatā aprāptā
na ca anya te śramaṇa brāhmaṇa āśrayanti
na ca lābhakāma vṛṣabhā sada dharmakāmāḥ
catudhyānadhyāyi na ca niśrita tatra dhyāne
na ca kīrtikāma na ca krodhaparītacittā
na ca ādiśanti puruṣaiḥ striya icchakarmāṃ
gambhīra rupa api vedana cetanā ca
yo bodhisattva imu budhyati eva dharmāṃ
yasmin na skandha na pi āyatanaṃ na dhātu
dānaṃ dadeyu vimalaṃ tatha śīla rakṣe
dharmaṃ bhaṇeya kala puṇya na dānaśīle
nāsti triloka śubha tena samaṃ bhaveyā
taṃ caiva puṇya puna khyāyati riktameva
tatha śūnya tuccha vaśikaṃ ca asārakaṃ ca
na ca kṣīyate na ca vivardhati dharmadhātuḥ
ye cāpi pañca imi pāramitā jinānām
na ca dagdha varti asatā na vinā ya dagdhā
na hi arci paścimanipāta sa varti dagdhā
asatā pi paścima na dahyati dīpavarti
prathameva citta spṛśatī na ca agrabodhim
asatā na tasya spṛśatā puna śakya bhonti
asatā na tasya puna prāpaṇanāya śakyam
so vāniruddha asato na hi tasya vṛkṣo
emeva citta prathamaṃ tu nidāna bodheḥ
so vā niruddha asato na hi tasya bodhiḥ
tattatphalaṃ na ca tadasti na cāpi nāsti
na ca nirvṛtiṃ spṛśati no ca nimittacārī
evaṃ carantu na ca manyati bodhisattvo
na ca trāsu bodhi bhavate na ihāsti kiṃcid
caturo sa māra atikramya dvaye ca bhūmim
asmin samādhi sthitu no ca spṛśāti bodhim
ta hi niśritā iha mahāpṛthivī jagacca
na ca nirvṛtiṃ spṛśati śūnyata nāsti sthānam
caratī imāṃ pravara śūnya samādhi śāntām
no cāpi tatra sthitu no ca patāti bhūmau
na ca nirvṛtiṃ spṛśati no ca nimittacārī
patanāya tasya purimasya na deya bhūmim
na nivartate na pi ca khidyati yāva tatra
na ca bhajyatī na pi ca khidyati kalpakoṭī
no ca prapāta patiyāti na yāva tatra
na ca nirvṛtiṃ spṛśati paśyati dharmacārī
api duḥkhito manasi bhoti sa jātisaṃgho
abhyantare ya nagare nigame ca grāme
no cāpi tatra sthihatī na ca ratnadvīpe
na ca geha mārgi kuśalo puna bhoti vijño
no cāpi tatra sthihate na ca buddhajñāne
na ca saṃskṛte bhavati mārgavidū vidhijño
yatha nirmito puruṣa no va adṛśyakāyo
nāmena vā puna sa prajñapanāya śakyaḥ
nāmena vā puna sa prajñapanāya śakyaḥ
na ca śocatī na ca sa vyākṛtu veditavyo
na ca tena manyanupapadyati nāpi mānam
buddho yadā bhavi idaṃ tava nāmadheyam
pūrvaṃ pi tubhya imi āsi guṇovarūpā
grāme ca rāṣṭri nigame viharanti nityaṃ
no cā viveku imu jānati bodhisattvo
na vivekagocaru ayaṃ hi jinena ukto
ahu mahya dharma ubhi eti abhūta śūnyā
no cāsya koṣṭhagatu so viṣu pātyate ca
ahasaṃjñi jāyi mriyate ca sadā abhūto
na hi atra kaści yo kliśyati śudhyate vā
kalapuṇya so na bhavatī iha dānaskandho
mahatīṃ janeti karuṇāṃ na ca sattvasaṃjñā
prajñāya pāramita yukta divā ca rātrau
aparasmi kāli puna labdhva bhaveya tuṣṭo
sa ha labdhva nāśayi puno 'pi pramādabhūto
tada māra tuṣṭu bhavatī paramaṃ udagro
ubhi eti dūra bhaviṣyanti jināna jñāne
apayāti vā sa iha śikṣati buddhadharme
yo śikṣamāṇu na upaiti kahiṃci śikṣāṃ
na ca śikṣakaṃ labhati nāpi ca śikṣadharmān
yo śikṣate sa iha śikṣati buddhadharme
yo bodhisattva imu jānati eva śikṣāṃ
na sa jātu śikṣavikalo bhavate duśīlo
satkāyadṛṣṭi yatha ṣaṣṭi duve ca dṛṣṭī
no cāpi tatra sthihatāna spṛheti teṣām
na ca prajña bodhi parieṣati āśayena
na hi tena tasya kutu kenacideṣa prāptā
te śiṣya māṃ janata so ca karoti kāryam
na ca tasya kāyu na pi citta na nāmadheyam
yatha buddha nirmita karoti ca buddhakāryaṃ
na ca tasyupadyati mado karamāṇu kiṃcit
puruṣe stritulya sa karoti ha sarvakāryam
sattvā ta sarvi parikalpa bhaveyu mārāḥ
sarve na śakya karaṇe vidu antarāyam
na ca budhyakaṃ labhati nāpi ca buddhadharmān
na ca deśikaṃ na pi ca paśyaka dharmatāyāṃ
ākāśi pakṣi viharāti na co patāti
dakamadhyi matsya viharāti na co marāti
sarveṣa śikṣa ayu agru niruttarā ca
itu te prasūta na ca kṣīyati dharmadhātuḥ
na ca medinī kṣayamupaiti na cāpi vṛddhiṃ
na ca khidyatī na parihāyati nirvikalpā
na ca kṣīyate na ca vivardhati jātu prajñā
na ca yantra kṣīyati avidya na cāpi vṛddhiḥ
na ca prajñapāramita vardhati hīyate vā
na ca ālayo na pi ca niśrayu kurvayāti
api kho punāśrayu ime catudhyāna sāṅgā
punarāgameya na ca niśrayu tatra kuryāt
labdhvā tu tatra spṛhabuddhi na saṃjaneyyā
ekāki so puna gṛhītva parasmi kāle
gṛhṇitva geha praviśitva na bhoti lubdho
rasa sparśa kāmaguṇa pañcabhi yukta bhogī
na ca svāmikasya prativākyu dadāti dāsī
ākruṣṭa cāpi athavā sada tāḍitā vā
yasminna kāyu na pi citta na sattvasaṃjñā
ko bhāṣate ka śṛṇute kutu kasya kena
kalapuṇya so na bhavate iha dānaskandhe
kasmā hu adya na kṣameya nidāna bodhau
na ca tena manyati na ātmana karṣayethā
api chidraśīlu na tu so pariśuddhaśīlo
yasyo na asti ahasaṃjña na sattvasaṃjñā
dattvā udagra bhavate na hi dvīpalabdho
na ca vastuniśrayu karoti daditva dānaṃ
vidu pāku naiva pratikāṅkṣati so kadācit
kācasya vā maṇina rāśi siyā mahanto
mamatāṃ na tatra karayenna ca vastuprema
aṣṭau ca akṣaṇa kṣaṇāṃ labhate sa nityam
lokārthaṃ hariṇā mayā suvihitā seyaṃ budhairgṛhyatām
āryāṣṭasāhasrikāyā bhagavatyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ parivartānusāreṇa bhagavatī ratnaguṇasaṃcayagāthā samāptā //
ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
